“Conservative Guys Are Going to Get All the Girls”: Author James Pogue on the New Right
Author James Pogue talks to cohosts Emily Jane Fox and Joe Hagan about the so-called New Right, the intellectual movement congealing around tech billionaire and MAGA mega-donor Peter Thiel and the Trumpist GOP, which he wrote about for the May issue of Vanity Fair.

After embedding himself with the vanguard of intellectuals whose reactionary politics, antagonism for democracy, and visions of retro-patriarchy inform the agendas of people like Tucker Carlson and J.D.
